item.title: LEORA is Now Released!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
The newest Alter/Ego “LEORA” by VoxWave has now officially been released! If you are not familiar with LEORA, she is a French and English voice bank for the Alter/Ego software. This is the second voice bank by VoxWave, who also created the French and Japanese voice bank “ALYS” for the same engine. She is voiced …

The post LEORA is Now Released! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The newest Alter/Ego “LEORA” by VoxWave has now officially been released! If you are not familiar with LEORA, she is a French and English voice bank for the Alter/Ego software. This is the second voice bank by VoxWave, who also created the French and Japanese voice bank “ALYS” for the same engine. She is voiced by the French YouTaite TBK.

If you liked ALYS, then you will also like LEORA. Not only that, with an English voice bank, English users will be able to finally try out an English Alter/Ego by VoxWave!

She will come with four voice banks:

  • English Core
  • English Power
  • French Core
  • French Power

Note: Currently only her French voice banks is available, however, her English voice banks will be added for free in a later update. She is currently an early access and is still in development.

You can purchase her on VoxWave’s official website for €70,00 EUR ($80 USD) here.

If you want to have an idea of what she sounds like, there is a demo of her as well!

Links

VoxWave’s Official Website

LEORA’s Official Facebook Page

The post LEORA is Now Released! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Leora Voice Sample Released
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
If you are familiar with the Alter/Ego voice bank “ALYS,” then you have most likely heard of LEORA. But if not, let us do a small introduction! LEORA is VoxWave‘s second voice bank and is meant to complement ALYS. Like ALYS, she will be a French virtual singer for the software Alter/Ego. We currently do not …

The post Leora Voice Sample Released appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
If you are familiar with the Alter/Ego voice bank “ALYS,” then you have most likely heard of LEORA. But if not, let us do a small introduction!

LEORA is VoxWave‘s second voice bank and is meant to complement ALYS. Like ALYS, she will be a French virtual singer for the software Alter/Ego. We currently do not have much information on her, but we do know that she is currently in development and that she is voiced by TBK.

You can find her voice samples below. Keep in mind that this is only a pre-Alpha version. The song is actually a cover of an ALYS song, and you can find the song here.

LEORA’s Facebook Page

VoxWave’s Official Website

The post Leora Voice Sample Released appeared first on VNN.

item.title: ALYS Song and Design Contest
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
For ALYS’ 3rd anniversary, VoxWave has opened up a song and a design contest! Both contests will be held from March 10th, 2017, (00:01 GMT+1) to April 30th, 2017 (23:59 GMT+1). The prizes for the design contest will be the following: 1st Place (Grand Prix): The winner’s illustration will be printed on a limited edition …

The post ALYS Song and Design Contest appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
For ALYS’ 3rd anniversary, VoxWave has opened up a song and a design contest! Both contests will be held from March 10th, 2017, (00:01 GMT+1) to April 30th, 2017 (23:59 GMT+1).

The prizes for the design contest will be the following:

1st Place (Grand Prix): The winner’s illustration will be printed on a limited edition sketchpad. Their (artist) name will be written on the back of the sketchpad with “1st place of the ALYS is 3 years old contest.” 5,000 sketchpads will be produced for France and foreign countries. A part of it will be sold by VoxWave and Clairefontaine.

Clairefontaine will provide the winner with stationery supplies for the coming year (€500 EUR of supplies, all taxes included), and VoxWave will provide the winner with ALYS merchandise (up to €100 EUR, all taxes included) along with a Rêve de Machine CD.

*First place is worth €600 EUR of prizes!

2nd Place (Two Special Mentions): Clairefontaine will provide the winner with stationery supplies for the coming year (€500 EUR of supplies, all taxes included), and VoxWave will provide the winner with ALYS merchandise (up to €60 EUR, all taxes included) along with a Rêve de Machine CD.

*Special mentions are worth 2 x €560 EUR of prizes!

The prizes for the song contest will be the following:

1st Place: The winner will have their song selected for an upcoming ALYS album and will win for this purpose a musician-composer contract with us! They will also win a software license or their choice of being published by Plogue or VoxWave, along with a €100 EUR discount on VoxWave’s ALYS merchandise! For this, another prize needs to be added, and it’s a really nice gift from Image-Line: a “Signature Bundle” license of the FL Studio software, worth €289 EUR.

2nd Place: The winner will receive a €50 EUR discount on ALYS merchandise in VoxWave’s e-shop, along with a “Producer Edition” license of the FL Studio software by Image-Line, worth €189 EUR.

3rd Place: The winner will receive a €25 EUR discount on ALYS merchandise in VoxWave’s e-shop, along with a “Fruity Edition” license of the FL Studio software by Image-Line, worth €89 EUR.

For all contest rules and information for the design contest, click here. For the song contest, click here.

The post ALYS Song and Design Contest appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Alter/Ego ALYS Preorder Now Available
item.dc:creator: Hoshi
item.description:
After much anticipation, ALYS is finally receiving a commercial voice bank. She will be able to sing in both Japanese and French. ALYS will be for the Alter/Ego engine.
According to Plogue (the creator of Alter/Ego):

"Alter/Ego is based on the award winning technology featured in chipspeech but instead of targeting Vintage voice technology, it

The post Alter/Ego ALYS Preorder Now Available appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
After much anticipation, ALYS is finally receiving a commercial voice bank. She will be able to sing in both Japanese and French. ALYS will be for the Alter/Ego engine.
According to Plogue (the creator of Alter/Ego):

“Alter/Ego is based on the award winning technology featured in chipspeech but instead of targeting Vintage voice technology, it focuses on more ‘modern’ (1990+) singing synthesis algorithms and research. It is specially tailored for musical needs – simply type in your lyrics, and then play on your MIDI keyboard. It’s a true synthesizer, the sound can be extensively modified for easy and expressive performances.”

The ALYS preorder is 10% off the final release price and is €90.00 inside of Europe. Those outside of Europe can get the voice for €75.00 ($84.94 USD) once they sign up or sign in to their account. Only a digital version is available at the moment with no word on a physical release.

You can preorder the digital version on VoxWave’s official website here. ALYS is set to be released on March 10th.

Currently, the only song featuring ALYS’ Alter/Ego bank is one of her very early beta. However, we’ve been told that a new demo should be out soon.

In addition, VoxWave has teased a release of some Lupin plushies.

On va beaucoup vous parler des préventes d'ALYS pour Alter/Ego prochainement, ça vous pouvez en être sûr.Mais ce qu'il…

Posted by Voxwave on Wednesday, February 10, 2016

They’re currently available for purchase on VoxWave’s website as well.

The post Alter/Ego ALYS Preorder Now Available appeared first on VNN.
